pages.text: Build an enclosure around log piles. This can be any size.$(br2)Cover most log piles except for one. This log pile needs to be lit with a fire starter or another technique. Once lit quickly cover the charcoal pit.$(br2)Wiki Chapter: $(br)$(l:wiki_manuals/charcoal_pit)Charcoal Pit Wiki$(/l)
$(mBlock)After you covered all log piles you should see smoke coming from the pit.
